sentence: Ms. DelBENE. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to congratulate Owen Zhang as  a top 40 finalist for the 2025 Regeneron Science Talent Search  (Regeneron STS). Regeneron STS is the most prestigious science  competition for high school seniors…
